author: Jordan3D

text: I only played Dead Rising 2 for a couple hours at a friend's house and quite enjoyed it, mainly thanks to the sheer amount of fun things you can do. This theme sounds like it could fit a next gen Metroid Prime boss theme! I won't be buying a PS4 or a XB1 this year, I prefer waiting at least until mid-2014 and see how it all turns out. I'll be upgrading my PC this year instead and I'll get a Wii U in 2-3 months.
